directions: Cut the bottoms of each strawberry so they can stand upright on a plate; hollow out the top of each strawberry. Spoon whipped cream and chocolate-hazelnut spread into the hollow part of each strawberry; top with 1 blueberry. Cover each filled strawberry with a mini graham cracker.
ingredients: 1 (13 ounce) jar chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)
title: Strawberry Graham Cracker Bites
